initial_question.title: only one picture is generated each time
initial_question.body:
Thank you for your great work!
But would you like to ask if only one picture is generated each time? If I generate two pictures, the following message will appear?

# ComfyUI Error Report
## Error Details
- **Node Type:** SamplerCustomAdvanced
- **Exception Type:** RuntimeError
- **Exception Message:** Boolean value of Tensor with more than one value is ambiguous
## Stack Trace
```
 File "C:\Users\ntzon\Projects\ComfyUI\execution.py", line 323, in execute
 output_data, output_ui, has_subgraph = get_output_data(obj, input_data_all, execution_block_cb=execution_block_cb, pre_execute_cb=pre_execute_cb)
 ^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^ ^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^ ^^^^^^
..........
.............
## Additional Context
(Please add any additional context or steps to reproduce the error here)

satisfaction_conditions: Multiple images can be generated simultaneously in a single execution
No runtime errors occur during batch processing
Batch processing works with different batch generation methods
System maintains compatibility with latest ComfyUI version

initial_question.title: RuntimeError: expected scalar type Half but found BFloat16 when executing SamplerCustomAdvanced node
initial_question.body:
ComfyUI_windows\python_embeded\Lib\site-packages\torch\nn\functional.py", line 2573, in layer_norm
    return torch.layer_norm(input, normalized_shape, weight, bias, eps, torch.backends.cudnn.enabled)
           ^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^
RuntimeError: expected scalar type Half but found BFloat16

satisfaction_conditions: Data type compatibility between model and hardware is achieved
Automatic detection of appropriate data type for the system
